TuiSong.Title: Good moning players
TuiSong.Description: Good morning warrior! Quickly go online to see what`s today reward!

TuiSong.Title: Activity after lunch
TuiSong.Description: Sleepy afternoon? Check out fiery fights in the game to stay energized!

TuiSong.Title: it is BOSS time
TuiSong.Description: Which boss is awakening? Come defeat it! First kill gets the reward !

TuiSong.Title: It is time for PK
TuiSong.Description: War of glory! Battle of the PK Kings! Warrior, let's Join the fight for our honor!

TuiSong.Title: MU Assistant
TuiSong.Description: Dear player, you have not been online for 3 days. All of your Friends are waiting for your comeback.

TuiSong.Title: MU Assistant
TuiSong.Description: Dear player, you have not been online for 7 days. All of your Friends are waiting for your comeback.

TuiSong.Title: MU Assistant
TuiSong.Description: Dear player, you have not been online for 15 days. All of your Friends are waiting for your comeback.

TuiSong.Title: Armed Forces Order
TuiSong.Description: Duang! Roland City Battle starts! War alliance is caling you for Battle. Wait for your coming!
